title: Man with a movie camera [Special edition]
creator_contributor_role: Museum of the Moving Image (BFI), distributor
description: Writer/Director/Editor, Dziga-Vertov, was made Head of the Cinema Department of the All Russian Central Executive at the age of 22. His film shows all the tricks of which the camera is capable. Vertov shows Russia as it really is; indeed, the final impact of the film arises from a feeling of participation in life itself as we share the unique vision of the camera-eye. This special edition runs the film twice. The first version is the original silent one, with a musical score composed and performed by the Alloy Orchestra. The second version contains a commentary by Yuri Tsivian, a leading historian in Russian silent cinema.
related_objects: Title; 301861; The Man with the movie camera = Chelovek s kinoapparatom; Active; 1928
